name: frank_write_file
description: Creates a new file or overwrites an existing file. YOU MUST USE THIS TOOL when the user asks you to build/create/make something. This is the PRIMARY tool - use it FIRST, not after explaining.

file_path.description: File path relative to project root (e.g., 'src/App.tsx' or 'src/components/Button.tsx')

content.description: Complete file content - must be valid, working code

name: frank_replace_code
description: Line-based search and replace tool. Use this for precise edits to existing files. Provide the search content (can use ellipsis ... for large sections), line numbers, and replacement content. This is the PREFERRED tool for editing existing code.

file_path.description: Path to the file to modify

search.description: Content to search for (without line numbers). Can use ellipsis ... for large omitted sections.

replace.description: New content to replace the search content with

name: frank_read_file
description: Read the contents of a file. The file path should be relative to the project root. You can optionally specify line ranges (e.g., '1-100, 200-300'). By default, reads the first 500 lines.

file_path.description: Path to the file to read

name: frank_search_files
description: Regex-based code search across files. Search using regex patterns with file filtering. Parameters: query (regex pattern), include_pattern (glob syntax like 'src/**/*.tsx'), exclude_pattern (optional), case_sensitive (default: false).

include_pattern.description: Files to include using glob syntax

exclude_pattern.description: Files to exclude using glob syntax

name: frank_add_package
description: Install an npm package to the project. Provide the package name with optional version (e.g., 'lodash@latest' or 'axios@^1.0.0').

name: frank_delete_file
description: Delete a file from the project. The file path should be relative to the project root.

file_path.description: Path to the file to delete

name: frank_rename_file
description: Rename a file. You MUST use this tool instead of creating new files and deleting old ones. Both paths should be relative to the project root.
